body_html: And at risk of asking a silly question, you are sure there is a cudnn.h in /home/userXXX/miniconda3/include (and it's not in some subdirectory like /home/userXXX/miniconda3/include/cudnn?)
body_text: And at risk of asking a silly question, you are sure there is a cudnn.h in /home/userXXX/miniconda3/include (and it's not in some subdirectory like /home/userXXX/miniconda3/include/cudnn?)
body: And at risk of asking a silly question, you are sure there is a `cudnn.h` in `/home/userXXX/miniconda3/include` (and it's not in some subdirectory like `/home/userXXX/miniconda3/include/cudnn`?)
